name: Out of the Dark (Gregor Sönnichsen)
description:
A dark-cyberpunky, atmospheric and short game about someone who seeks to escape their strained mind. Players have to navigate through a course of deadly obstacles, which can only be seen in the alternate state called 'ghost mode'. Exploring the level, players might find the avatar commenting on what they brought into their mind.

developed during global game jam 2022 by Gregor Sönnichsen

uses
100 metal synth by Thirsk (edited)
lurk by stickman (edited)
Uncracked Font by typefactory
VFX Bundle 2 by SoerGame
Interface and Item Sounds Pack by Daydream Sound
POLYGON City Pack by Synty Studios
